QuestData.Title: My Head and Shoulders
QuestData.Description:
If we're going to fight Urok, I will need my gear back. It was all lost when I was running from Urok de first time.
Shut UP, Sur'jan! I had to ditch it in order to run faster.
Bring my gear back to me, and I'll be ready to fight Urok with you.
QuestData.LogDescription: Recover Sur'jan's head and shoulder gear.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Meet Sur'jan outside of Urok's lair.
